plot: A young film maker travels around the globe to discover the complexities and consequences of viewing the War on terrorism and Arabs as a war against "Us and Them."
title: Arabs and Terrorism
plot_es: A young film maker travels around the globe to discover the complexities and consequences of viewing the War on terrorism and Arabs as a war against "Us and Them."
plot_en: A young film maker travels around the globe to discover the complexities and consequences of viewing the War on terrorism and Arabs as a war against "Us and Them."
